name: Mayur Dehade
bio: Aspiring Full Stack Developer | Computer Engineer | MySQL | Designing | Java | DSA | JavaScript | Angular | React | TypeScript
about: I am Mayur Dehade, a Computer Engineering graduate from Pune University with a strong passion for full-stack web development. My expertise spans across technologies such as Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, React JS, MongoDB, SQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Angular, allowing me to create scalable and efficient web applications. I enjoy working on complex projects and have developed solutions that demonstrate my ability to address real-world challenges.
about2: I am proficient in web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular, React, SASS, and Tailwind CSS, and have experience working with tools like Git, GitHub, and Postman. My focus is on writing clean, scalable, and secure code, and I am always eager to learn new technologies and stay updated with industry trends. With strong problem-solving abilities and a commitment to delivering high-quality solutions, I am ready to take on challenges and grow as a Full Stack Developer.
summary: Aspiring Full Stack Java Developer with hands-on experience in building web applications using Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, and Angular. Skilled in backend and frontend development, database management, and creating REST APIs. Quick learner with strong problem-solving skills, eager to contribute and grow in a professional environment.
